title: My Bestie Got Fired Because Of Me
itunes:title: My Bestie Got Fired Because Of Me
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, my best friend worked as a bartender at a popular restaurant and she introduced me to the new manager of the restaurant recently. He’s middle aged, handsome, tall and he has a nice beard. I was hooked on him because of how well he carried himself and I’ve always been attracted to older men. This restaurant has the best Sunday brunch and I’m always there, with my bottomless mimosas and a few of my other girlfriends......................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
